import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import React, { Component } from 'react' import ProjectBody from './ProjectBody' import './Body.css' handleCardClick = index => { console.log(index, this) const { currentPair } = this.state if (currentPair.length === 2) { return } if (currentPair.length === 0) { this.setState({ currentPair: [index] }) return } this.handleNewPairClosedBy(index) } const Body = ({profil, project}) => (
{profil === "visiteur" ?

Projects

{project.map((project, index) => ( ))}
:
En cours
}
) export default Body
